ruleset.name: Spryker ruleset
ruleset.description: Asserting clean code architecture with Spryker framework.

rule.name: OneNewInFactory
rule.message: Avoid to use more than one new statement in a factory method '{0}'.

rule.name: MethodMustStartWithCreateInFactory
rule.message: Method must start with create*.See method '{0}'.

rule.name: FacadeNotReturnInternals
rule.message: A facade method must not return return anything else than simple types or transfer objects '{0}'.

rule.name: FacadeMustNotHaveProperties
rule.message: A facade must not have any properties '{0}'.

rule.name: QueryMisuse
rule.message: Illegal usage of a query object: '{0}'.
